title: What packages will be installed on the Field computer, and can we ask for additional ones?

content.raw:
For example, if we wish to use the ros-indigo-laser-assembler package, which is not installed when you follow the tutorial instructions, how should we accomplish that?

Ideally, we would be told that the field computer will be configured as per the tutorial, and that we are permitted to request the installation of any given ros-indigo package.

The alternate would be for us to include these libraries within our own code.  That is quite doable, but can become a fair pain in the ass when you have a package with a number of dependencies.
